code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from"react";import{ListItem,ListItemText,Button}from"@material-ui/core";import{db}from"./firebase_config";export default function TodoListItem(_ref){var message=_ref.message,inprogress=_ref.inprogress,id=_ref.id;function toggleInProgress(){db.collection("messages").doc(id).update({inprogress:!inprogress});}function deleteMessage(){db.collection("messages").doc(id).delete();}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:"flex"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItem,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:message,secondary:inprogress?"Para ler":"Já lida"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:toggleInProgress,children:inprogress?"Não Lida":"Lida"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:deleteMessage,children:"Deletar mensagem"})]});}
